app_killswitch.title: App Killswitch
app_killswitch.description: Master control for enabling/disabling the service. Turns off all services, paid & unpaid. Kicks everyone's session.

effects.dialog_body: We regret to inform that the app is no longer available :(

app_maintenance_mode.title: App Maintenance Mode
app_maintenance_mode.description: Master control for enabling/disabling maintenance mode on the app. Kicks everyone's session.

effects.dialog_body: Occup.ie is currently undergoing maintenance, please check back later.
Landlord login has temporarily been disabled, please check back later.
Tenant login has temporarily been disabled, please check back later.
